education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Robotics Engineering

workExperience.description: • Worked as a Research Assistant, focusing on developing a ground-up Mixed Reality application tailored for Microsoft's Hololens platform. • Designed and implemented an innovative application that enables construction supervisors to efficiently navigate through complex construction sites, all within confined physical spaces. • Utilized the Mixed Reality Toolkit within the Unity development environment, employing the C# programming language to create an immersive and functional solution.

• Conceptualized, designed, and developed Funzy, a Kids Educational app aimed at fostering problem-solving skills in kids. • Received the prestigious Teacher’s Approval Batch on Play Store from Google for the application. • Crossed 4000+ organic downloads. • Developed over 15 games from scratch using Unity game engine and C#, implementing various gameplay mechanics and interactive features. • Collaborated with parents and educators to ensure the alignment of educational content.

• Contributed to the development of an edtech application focused on Augmented Reality elements. • Rewrote the entire application using C#, NodeJS, and AWS S3. • Developed engaging games and interactive content for children's learning. • Optimized the application's performance and user experience. • Successfully implemented AR technology to enhance the app's features and functionality.

projects.title: Funzy Kids Educational App
projects.description: • As a solo developer conceptualized, designed, and developed Funzy, a Kids Educational app aimed at fostering problem-solving skills in kids.

achievements.title: $7K Revenue
achievements.description: Generated over $7K in revenue through in-game advertisements in previous games.

achievements.title: Children's Educational App
achievements.description: Successfully published Kids Educational App (Funzy) on both the App Store and Play Store. Gained 2000+ organic downloads and a teacher’s approval batch from Google.

achievements.title: Hack Real Time Communication Hackathon Winner
achievements.description: Secured 1st prize in Hack Real Time Communication Hackathon organized at IIT Chicago.
